venue.name: Wrentham Developmental Center Cracker Barrel Fairgrounds

item.description:
“ Spring Fling 4 Terrier Fun Day”
May 2,2010

Wrentham Developmental Center
Crackerbarrel Fairgrounds
498 Emerald Street
Wrentham, MA

Admission: $10/dog
(Proceeds go to JRT charities)

Racing, GTG, and Super Earth will open from 9:00am – 12:00pm

Puppies will race first, followed by all other dogs
All dogs must be muzzled for racing. Closed end muzzles only please!
GTG & Super Earth will be going on simultaneously with racing.

Lunch Break- 12:00 – 12:45
Please bring your own lunch.
Lure Coursing will open from 12:45pm – 3:30pm

Directions: 495 N or S to exit 15 Rt 1 A ( South St.) north. Follow 1A north through Wrentham center until you come to blinking yellow light at North St. Take left onto North St. then left onto Emerald St. Follow to the fairgrounds on your right.

Sponsored by Alan Wylie, Joanne LaChance, Denise DeCosta & Lisa and Dave Benoit
For more information contact: Alan at awylie1@msn.com
Denise at seadogjrt@hotmail.com
Great way to get your terriers tuned up for Yankee Terrier Trial..
Looking forward to seeing you all…..

group.name: Jack Russell Terrier Boston Area Group

item.name: FUN DAY ANNOUNCEMENT!
